title: Awesome but probably batshit insane gamemode; GLOBAL EVERYTHING
body:
Global EVERYTHING, all abilities, autos, spells, etc all work at a global range.
Heatseeking Annie Qs from across the map, Ashe W carpetbombing, Irelia dashing from top to bot lane,
Evelynn Q slowly surging through the map. Ezreal is everywhere.
This is the craziest idea I've had in a while.
EDIT: Okay, maybe not autos.
